title: The Adventure Zone: Amnesty - Episode 11
description: The Pine Guard arrive at an unlikely battleground, and face off against their shapeshifting foe. With an ominous vision predicting catastrophe, can they conquer the abomination before meeting their end in a watery grave? Aubrey taps into something new. Duck takes flight. Ned goes for a night swim.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
